quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.text: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Your focus determines your reality.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.text: Simplicity boils down to two steps: Identify the essential. Eliminate the rest.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.text: Until we can manage time, we can manage nothing else.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
